definition: variant of 重複|重复[chong2 fu4]
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter

pinyin: chong2 fu4 shi3 li4 shang1 hai4
fei1 ci2 chong2 fu4 ce4 yan4

sentences.english: This study is significant for generation of ultra-short optical pulse chain at high repetition rate.
sentences.chinese: 该研究对高重复率脉冲串产生具有一定意义。

sentences.english: Other ideas include encouraging guests to reuse towels and linens.
sentences.chinese: 其他措施包括鼓励客人重复使用毛巾和床单。

sentences.english: The exercises should cause exhaustion after the total repetitions are completed.
sentences.chinese: 这种锻炼在所有的重复完毕后应该使自己精疲力尽。

sentences.english: Repeat this procedure until every pattern piece has been individually traced-off.
sentences.chinese: 重复这道程序，直到每一张衣片纸样独立描下。

sentences.english: To avoid duplication, please do not mail faxed order form.
sentences.chinese: 已传真表格，毋须再邮寄，以免重复。

sentences.english: The water and the organic compound can be reused.
sentences.chinese: 水和有机化合物可以被重复利用。

sentences.english: He repeated the word several times.
sentences.chinese: 他把那个词重复了几遍。

sentences.english: That process can repeat over and over, so the cells rarely need replacing.
sentences.chinese: 这个过程可以不断的重复，所以电池几乎不需要更换。

sentences.english: These repetitive and necessary alterations can only be realized by the original designer.
sentences.chinese: 这些重复但必要的改动只能由原设计师来实现。

sentences.english: Should the disinfected needle dry out before re-using it?
sentences.chinese: 是否应该在针具消毒晾干后再重复使用？

sentences.english: Repeat this process, to keep your inboxes empty .
sentences.chinese: 重复这些步骤，保持你的收件箱为空。

sentences.english: The true feelings reveal, here two are redundant is how could it not be more moving? Also for example.
sentences.chinese: 真情流露，这里的两个重复岂不更令人感动？又如。

sentences.english: These two steps repeat recursively and depth first.
sentences.chinese: 这两步递归地以深度优先的方式重复。

sentences.english: Totally 99 repeated articles were deleted and 22 were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 排除99篇重复文献，纳入22篇用于综述。

sentences.english: OCD patients feel compelled to repeat behaviours such as washing their hands.
sentences.chinese: 强迫症患者倍感强迫来重复一系列行为，如重复洗手。

sentences.english: OCD patients feel compelled to repeat behaviours such as washing their hands.
sentences.chinese: 强迫症患者倍感强迫来重复一系列行为，如重复洗手。

definition: variant of 反覆|反复[fan3 fu4]
repeatedly/over and over/to upend/unstable/to come and go/(of an illness) to return
lit. the cycle comes back to the start (idiom); to move in circles/the wheel comes full circle
one time (all the way through)/once through
to repeat (one's own words or sb else's)/(in the classroom) to paraphrase what one has learned
variant of 複述|复述[fu4 shu4]
to remember/to bear in mind/to learn by heart
to make a round trip/return journey/back and forth/to and fro/repeatedly
nothing much changes (idiom); always the same/stuck in a rut
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
